publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3470 Bill Kidd: Yoker Community Café Presented with Healthy Living Award—That the Parliament offers its congratulations to Yoker Café in Yoker Community Campus, which is staffed by Momentum’s workability programme, on having been presented with a Healthy Living Award by Consumer Focus Scotland; notes that these awards are funded by the Scottish Government and awarded to catering venues of all kinds for endeavouring to serve healthier food; recognises the efforts of Gerry Mullaney, Manager and Catering Tutor at the Yoker Community Campus, in implementing a number of small changes that have made a big difference to customers’ health, and believes that the Yoker Community Campus provides a commendable example for other catering places to follow in increasing awareness of healthy eating and providing healthier food. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Angela Constance*, Robin Harper*, Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-3470 Yoker Community Café Presented with Healthy Living Award (lodged on 17 February 2009) Bill Butler*
S3M-3470 Yoker Community Café Presented with Healthy Living Award (lodged on 17 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
